prompt_list: How have societal values and beliefs changed throughout history, and what role have mass media and technology played in driving these changes?
How does the rise of technology and automation shape our thoughts on the value of human labor and the implications for future economic growth?
How does a society balance productivity and the pursuit of happiness when the two goals appear to be at odds with one another?
How can we make sure that individuals from all economic backgrounds have equal access to opportunities and resources that will enable them to achieve success in their respective fields of interest?
Why do some people embrace collectivism while others prefer individualism in their everyday life and in the civic and political decisions they make?
